docs.snippet: The 118-room private club, site of an opulent New Year’s Eve party, is where the president-elect feels “so comfortable in his own skin, and so relaxed.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The 118-room private club, site of an opulent New Year’s Eve party, is where the president-elect feels “so comfortable in his own skin, and so relaxed.”

headline.main: Mar-a-Lago, the Future Winter White House and Home of the Calmer Trump
headline.print_headline: Mar-a-Lago, Future Winter White House and Home of a Calmer Trump

docs.snippet: A top aide to President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday that the White House may have disproportionately punished Russia by ordering the expulsion of 35 suspected Russian spies....
docs.lead_paragraph: A top aide to President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday that the White House may have disproportionately punished Russia by ordering the expulsion of 35 suspected Russian spies.

headline.main: Trump Aide Says U.S. Sanctions on Russia May Be Disproportionate
headline.print_headline: Trump Aide Says U.S. Sanctions on Russia May Be Disproportionate

docs.snippet: As Barack Obama began preparing to leave office, the first smartphone-toting U.S. president ordered his team to upgrade the White House's aging technology for his successor. New computers were purchased and faster internet was installed....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Barack Obama began preparing to leave office, the first smartphone-toting U.S. president ordered his team to upgrade the White House's aging technology for his successor. New computers were purchased and faster internet was installed.

headline.main: Obama Boosted White House Technology; Trump Sees Risks
headline.print_headline: Obama Boosted White House Technology; Trump Sees Risks
